Verses: 1 indha Moondraandharam Naan Ungalidaththirku Varugiren; Sagala Kaariyangalum Irandumoondru Saatchigaludaiya Vaakkinaal Nilaivarappadum.

2 naan Irandaandharam Ungalidaththilirundhapodhu Sonnadhupola, Ippozhudhu Thooramaayirundhum Ungalidaththilirukkiravanaaga, Naan Marupadiyum Vandhaal Thappavidamaattenendru Munbu Paavanjeydhavargalukkum Matra Ellaarukkum Munnariviththu Ezhudhugiren.
3 kiristhu Enakkulle Pesugiraarenbadharku Aththaatchi Thedugireergale; Avar Ungalidamaai Balaveenaralla, Ungalidaththil Vallavaraayirukkiraar.

4 enenil Avar Balaveenaththaal Siluvaiyil Araiyappattirundhum, Dhevanudaiya Vallamaiyinaal Pizhaiththirukkiraar; Appadi Naangalum Avarukkul Balaveenaraayirundhum, Ungalidamaai Vilangiya Dhevanudaiya Vallamaiyinaal Avarudanekoodap Pizhaiththiruppom.

5 neengal Visuvaasamullavargalovendru Ungalai Neengale Sodhiththu Ariyungal; Ungalai Neengale Pareetchiththup Paarungal. Yesukiristhu Ungalukkul Irukkiraarendru Ungalai Neengale Ariyeergalaa? Neengal Pareetchaikku Nillaadhavargalaayirundhaal Ariyeergal.

7 melum Neengal Oru Pollaangum Seyyaadhirukkumpadiyaaga, Dhevanai Nokki Vinnappam Pannugiren. Naangal Pareetchaikku Nindravargalendru Kaanappadumporuttalla, Naangal Pareetchaikku Nillaadhavargalpolirundhaalum, Neengal Nalamaanadhai Seyyumporutte Vinnappam Pannugiren
8 saththiyaththirku Virodhamaaga Naangal Ondrunjeyyakkoodaamal, Saththiyaththirku Anukoolamaagave Seyyakkoodum.
9 naangal Balaveenarum Neengal Balamullavargalumaayirukkaiyil, Santhoshappadugirom; Neengal Narseerporundhumpadikkum Vinnappampannugirom.

10 aanadhaal Idiththuppodavalla, Oondrak Kattave Karththar Enakkuk Koduththa Adhikaaraththinpadi, Naan Ungalidaththil Vandhirukkumpodhu, Kandidhampannaadhapadikku, Naan Thooramaayirundhu Ivaigalai Ezhudhugiren.

11 kadaisiyaaga, Sagodharare, Santhoshamaayirungal, Narseer Porundhungal, Aarudhaladaiyungal; Egasindhaiyaayirungal, Samaadhaanamaayirungal, Appozhudhu Anbukkum Samaadhaanaththukkum Kaaranaraagiya Dhevan Ungalodekooda Iruppaar.
14 karththaraagiya Yesukiristhuvinudaiya Kirubaiyum, Dhevanudaiya Anbum, Parisuththa Aaviyinudaiya Aikkiyamum, Ungal Anaivarodunkooda Iruppadhaaga. Aamen.
